original_text: The armed guard marched ahead of the priests who blew the trumpets, and the rear guard followed the ark. All this time the trumpets were sounding.
korean_text: 그 무장한 자들은 나팔 부는 제사장들 앞에서 행진하며 후군은 궤 뒤를 따르고 제사장들은 나팔을 불며 행진하더라

sentences.original_text: of the priests who blew the trumpets
and the rear guard followed the ark
All this time the trumpets were sounding
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 시간 동안 나팔 소리가 계속 울려 퍼졌다
